mapper.select: SELECT content_id, content_type_id, title, addr1, addr2, zipcode, tel, first_image, first_image2, readcount, sido_code, gugun_code, latitude, longitude, mlevel FROM attraction_info WHERE readcount >= 1 AND content_type_id = 39 AND first_image != ''

SELECT m.mon, m.region, m.title, m.latitude, m.longitude, MAX(d.overview) as overview, MAX(i.addr1) as addr1, MAX(i.addr2) as addr2, MAX(i.first_image) as first_image FROM attraction_info i JOIN attraction_description d ON i.content_id = d.content_id JOIN monthly m ON i.title LIKE CONCAT('%', m.title, '%') WHERE i.first_image != '' AND m.mon = MONTH(CURDATE()) AND i.content_type_id = 12 GROUP BY m.mon, m.region, m.title, m.latitude, m.longitude;
